input.sentences: i walked around the school in the morning before the kids got there .
the library was totally quiet | just the way i like it .
none of my co-workers were around either .
i went back to my office and got some needed work done .
before i knew it | it was 5 o'clock and time to go home .
output.sentences: Two chairs face the same direction.
The main desk area is deserted.
A computer sits surrounded by paperwork.
It is five O'Clock at the library.
